item.title: EXCLUSIVE: After Hera Pheri, Tabu reunites with Akshay Kumar and Priyadarshan on Bhooth Bangla franchise - PINKVILLA
item.description:
EXCLUSIVE: After Hera Pheri, Tabu reunites with Akshay Kumar and Priyadarshan on Bhooth Bangla franchise

Published on: Dec 19, 2024 | Source: Pinkvilla

Bhooth Bangla is a highly anticipated film set to release in 2026, featuring Akshay Kumar and Tabu among other notable stars.

  • Tabu has signed on for a key role after a long hiatus with Akshay Kumar since their last film together in 2000.
  • The film is described as a horror comedy combining elements of Indian mythology.
  • Producer Ekta Kapoor is involved, aiming to develop Bhooth Bangla into a franchise.
  • Shooting is currently underway, with a release date set for April 2, 2026.
“Tabu is reuniting with Akshay Kumar and Priyadarshan after their last collaboration on Hera Pheri in 2000. The actress loved her part and the script, which marries horror and humour with Indian Mythology.”

Bhooth Bangla is set to mark a significant comeback of the beloved duo on screen in a new comedic horror setting.

item.title: OTT Review: Leela Vinodham – Telugu film on ETV Win - 123telugu
item.description:
Leela Vinodham Telugu Movie Review

Release Date: December 19, 2024

Source: 123telugu.com

Leela Vinodham is the latest web film that premiered today on ETV Win. Popular YouTuber Shanmukh Jaswanth and the charming Anagha Ajith play the lead roles. Read our review to find out how it measures up.

Key Points

  • The story is set in 2008, focusing on a student, PMRK Prasad, who struggles to express his feelings for his classmate, Leela.
  • It captures the uncertainty of teenage love and nostalgia for the era before mobile phones were commonplace.
  • Shanmukh Jaswanth and Anagha Ajith deliver decent performances, with Mirchi Saran standing out for his comedic role.
  • The screenplay has issues with pacing, and certain scenes feel slow and underdeveloped.
  • While the film has appealing elements, it ultimately does not deliver a memorable experience.
“Leela Vinodham is a village love story that works in a few parts but ultimately falls short of being memorable.”

In conclusion, while the film captures a nostalgic charm and has commendable performances, it struggles with pacing and emotional depth. Viewers might find other entertainment options more satisfying.

item.title: Central India Crowns Pushpa 2 as the All-Time Box Office Champion, Surpassing Baahubali 2 - PINKVILLA
item.description:
Central India Crowns Pushpa 2 as the All-Time Box Office Champion, Surpassing Baahubali 2

Publication Date: Dec 19, 2024 | Source: Pinkvilla

Pushpa 2 has officially become the highest-grossing film in Central India, with box office collections reaching Rs. 135 crore nett, surpassing the previous record held by Baahubali 2, which earned Rs. 123 crore.

  • Pushpa 2's total box office collections in India stand at Rs. 552.50 crore nett.
  • The film is set to close the gap with other top-grossing films, including Stree 2 and Jawan.
  • Pushpa 2 is especially popular in Central India, which includes Madhya Pradesh, Chhattisgarh, and parts of Gujarat and Maharashtra.
  • Only two other films have crossed Rs. 100 crore in Central India: Gadar 2 and Stree 2.
“Pushpa 2 is expected to widen the gap by a final number of over Rs. 175 crore.”

This achievement underscores the growing dominance of regional films in the Indian box office, challenging the traditional Bollywood hits.

Publication Date: October 2023, Source: Times of India

Devoleena Bhattacharjee and her husband Shanawaz have welcomed their first child, a baby boy. The couple shared their joy on social media.

  • Devoleena posted about the arrival of their baby boy on her social media accounts.

“We are overjoyed to announce the arrival of our son!”

item.title: Keerthy Suresh shares photos with ‘dream icon’ Vijay from wedding ceremony, makes first appearance for Baby John after tying the knot - The Indian Express
item.description:
Keerthy Suresh shares photos with ‘dream icon’ Vijay from wedding ceremony, makes first appearance for Baby John after tying the knot

Date: October 2023, Source: Indian Express

Keerthy Suresh recently shared unseen photos from her wedding with Antony Thattil, highlighting Tamil superstar Vijay's presence at the ceremony, whom she affectionately calls her 'dream icon'.

  • Keerthy Suresh married Antony Thattil in an intimate ceremony in Goa.
  • She shared wedding photos on Instagram, expressing joy over Vijay's attendance.
  • Vijay and Keerthy previously collaborated in films including 'Sarkar' and 'Bairavaa'.
  • Keerthy is set to release her Hindi film 'Baby John' soon and has resumed work post-marriage.
  • She attended a press conference in Mumbai alongside co-stars Varun Dhawan and Wamiqa Gabbi.
“When our dream icon blessed us at our dream weddinggg! @actorvijay sir 🤗❤️ With love, Your Nanbi and Nanban #ForTheLoveOfNyke” - Keerthy Suresh

Keerthy is renowned for her role in the biopic 'Mahanati', which earned her a National Award.

item.title: Viral Pic: Thalapathy Vijay poses with newlyweds Keerthy Suresh and Antony - 123telugu
item.description:
Viral Pic: Thalapathy Vijay poses with newlyweds Keerthy Suresh and Antony

Published on Dec 19, 2024 | Source: 123Telugu

Actress Keerthy Suresh married her longtime partner Antony in a beautiful ceremony in Goa. The wedding was celebrated with both Hindu and Christian traditions.

  • The wedding was attended by a few special guests, including Thalapathy Vijay.
  • Keerthy shared moments from the celebration on Instagram, making the picture with Vijay go viral.
  • The viral photo received over 1 million likes on social media.
  • Keerthy is currently promoting her upcoming film, Baby John, set to release this Christmas.
“The captivating picture quickly went viral, garnering over 1 million likes.”

Fans are eagerly awaiting Keerthy's upcoming film amidst the excitement generated by her wedding.

item.title: Ram Charan to end his Ayyappa Deeksha in this country? - 123telugu
item.description:
Ram Charan to End Ayyappa Deeksha in this country?

Published on Dec 19, 2024 8:01 am IST

Tollywood star Ram Charan, a devoted follower of Lord Ayyappa, is set to conclude his Ayyappa Deeksha this year in Dallas, Texas, prior to a major film event.

  • Ram Charan has performed Ayyappa Deeksha regularly for several years.
  • This year, he has been in Deeksha for over a month.
  • He will end his Deeksha at the Ayyappa Swamy temple in Dallas on December 21, hours before the pre-release event of his film Game Changer.
  • Game Changer, directed by Shankar, features Kiara Advani and is scheduled for a pan-Indian release on January 10.
“Game Changer is one of the most eagerly awaited biggies in India.”

This marks a significant moment as Ram Charan balances his spiritual commitments with his professional career, highlighting the diversity in his roles as both an actor and a devotee.

item.title: Keerthy Suresh shares pics with ‘dream icon’ Vijay from her ‘dream wedding' with Antony Thattil in Goa - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Keerthy Suresh shares pics with ‘dream icon’ Vijay from her ‘dream wedding' with Antony Thattil in Goa

Date: Dec 19, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

Keerthy Suresh recently tied the knot with her longtime boyfriend, Antony Thattil, in a beautiful ceremony held in Goa. A notable guest in attendance was her co-star, Thalapathy Vijay.

  • Keerthy shared photos from her wedding on Instagram, showing her and Antony in traditional wedding attire.
  • Vijay was seen alongside the couple, adding to the joy of the occasion.
  • Keerthy referred to Vijay as her 'dream icon' in her Instagram post celebrating the event.
  • The couple's dog featured in some pictures, showcasing their happiness during the wedding rituals.
  • Keerthy is set to appear in the upcoming film, 'Baby John', alongside Varun Dhawan, scheduled for release on December 25.
  • Vijay is currently filming his 69th project and plans to enter Tamil Nadu politics soon.
“When our dream icon blessed us at our dream weddinggg!” - Keerthy Suresh

This wedding not only marks a significant personal milestone for Keerthy Suresh but also highlights the camaraderie and mutual admiration among Tamil cinema stars.

item.title: Mamta Kulkarni clarifies she's not returned to Mumbai for Bollywood: ‘Not planning to make a return as an actress’ - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Mamta Kulkarni Clarifies She's Not Returned to Mumbai for Bollywood

Publication Date: [Date of Publication] Source: [Source Name]

Mamta Kulkarni, who recently returned to Mumbai after 25 years, has made it clear that she does not plan to make a comeback as an actress.

  • Kulkarni stated, 'I have not come back for Bollywood and I am not planning to make a return as an actress.'
  • She spoke about her relationship with Vicky Goswami, emphasizing her lack of ties to the drug world.
  • A non-bailable warrant was issued against her and Goswami in connection with a drug investigation in 2017.
  • Kulkarni shared her emotional experience of returning to India after two decades.
  • She has expressed feelings of nostalgia upon revisiting her homeland.
“Now, I am not in touch with him, I last contacted him in 2016.”

The article highlights Kulkarni's personal reflections and connections to her past as she re-establishes her presence in Mumbai.

item.title: OTT: Singham Again will be free to stream starting this date? - 123telugu
item.description:
Singham Again Set to Stream for Free on Amazon Prime

Published on: December 19, 2024 7:02 am IST

Singham Again, the latest installment in Rohit Shetty's cop universe, will be available for streaming free with an Amazon Prime subscription starting December 27, 2024.

  • The impressive cast includes notable stars like Ajay Devgn, Akshay Kumar, and a special cameo by Salman Khan.
  • Produced by major studios including Reliance Entertainment and Jio Studios, the film features a dynamic soundtrack.
“This action-packed drama features an impressive ensemble cast and delivers thrilling action complemented by a dynamic soundtrack.”

Fans are eagerly awaiting the official announcement regarding its availability on Amazon Prime.

item.title: Nita Ambani was coming out of a shop when an angry woman...; her bodyguard was.., watch viral video - India.com
item.description:
Nita Ambani's Viral Encounter Outside a Boutique

Publication Date: December 19, 2024

Source: India.com

Nita Ambani, the wife of Mukesh Ambani, was recently filmed in a lighthearted incident while exiting a boutique in Bengaluru. As she prepared to leave in her luxury car, an encounter with a local woman went viral, showcasing an unexpected moment of exchange.

  • Nita was shopping at 'House of Angadi', a renowned saree boutique.
  • She was seen acknowledging the crowd with gestures of gratitude.
  • An angry local woman confronted one of her bodyguards about traffic disruption caused by Nita's vehicle.
  • The incident was celebrated on social media, turning the local woman into an unexpected heroine.
  • The conversation was not audible, but the body language suggested notable frustration.
"Her fearless response resonated with many, earning applause for what was seen as a moment of 'real-world karma.'" - Social media commentary

This incident highlights the sometimes stark interactions between high-profile individuals and the public, reminding us of the everyday challenges faced by citizens.

item.title: Horoscope Today, December 19, 2024: Check here Astrological prediction for all zodiac signs - India Today
item.description:
Daily Horoscope: Find out Astrological predictions for December 19, 2024

Published On: Dec 19, 2024

Source: Ayush Bisht

Explore your astrological insights for all zodiac signs today, including predictions for love, health, money, and career.

  • Aries: Patience in emotional conversations, increased material resources, attractive job proposals.
  • Taurus: Focus on garnering support and effective communication; work-related travel may occur.
  • Gemini: Relationship improvement and attractive proposals; focus on health and personality.
  • Cancer: Increased creativity and successful partnerships; progress on pending tasks.
  • Leo: Keep control over budgets; maintain readiness for professional matters.
  • Virgo: Commercial opportunities expand with noteworthy financial gains expected.
  • Libra: Professionals will excel; opportunities for managerial benefits increase.
  • Scorpio: Focus on spiritual growth and higher education; favorable commercial matters.
  • Sagittarius: Emphasis on following rules and personal engagement with family.
  • Capricorn: Professional harmony; opportunities in trade and industry will be present.
  • Aquarius: Focus on hard work; cautiousness with finances is advised.
  • Pisces: Strong professional presence and interest in religious and modern subjects.

item.title: Pushpa 2 box office collection day 14 [updated live]: Allu Arjun and Rashmika Mandanna’s film hits Rs 973 - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Pushpa 2 Box Office Collection Day 14 [Updated Live]

Publication Date: October 2023 | Source: Times of India

The mass entertainer ‘Pushpa 2’, starring Allu Arjun and Rashmika Mandanna, continues to set records at the box office even after two weeks of release, nearing the Rs 1000 crore mark.

  • As of day 14, the film has collected a total of Rs 973.2 crore in India across all languages.
  • The day-wise collection indicates a steady performance, with notable earnings across Telugu (Rs 293.3 Cr) and Hindi (Rs 607.35 Cr).
  • The film is only Rs 26.2 crore short of reaching the Rs 1000 crore club.
  • 'Pushpa 2' has received a 3.5-star rating from ETimes, with praise for its direction and narrative depth.
“Director Sukumar’s brilliance shines through in 'Pushpa 2: The Rule.'”

‘Pushpa 2’ is set to be released on OTT in February 2025, with Netflix acquiring the rights for its streaming.

item.title: Allu Arjun's Father Meets Stampede Victim's Husband, Visits Injured Son In Hospital - News18
item.description:
Allu Arjun's Father Meets Stampede Victim's Husband, Visits Injured Son In Hospital

Date: December 18, 2024 Source: News18

Allu Arjun’s father, Allu Aravind, visited a Hyderabad hospital to check on a child injured in the December 4 stampede during the screening of 'Pushpa 2: The Rule'. He also met with the family of the deceased woman.

  • Allu Aravind visited the injured child in the hospital.
  • The health of the child is critical; he has suffered brain damage and is on ventilator support.
  • Telangana Health Secretary and Hyderabad Police Commissioner also visited and provided updates on the child's condition.
  • The stampede resulted in the death of a 35-year-old woman and severe injuries to her 9-year-old son.
“I remain deeply concerned about young Sri Tej, who is under constant medical care after the unfortunate incident. My prayers remain with them...” - Allu Arjun

This incident has brought significant attention to safety measures during public events.

item.title: Diddy stuns with dramatic ‘weight loss, grayer’ look at new court hearing as judge rejects… - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Diddy attends pretrial hearing amid legal battles

Date: Dec 19, 2024
Source: Hindustan Times

Sean “Diddy” Combs appears drastically changed during a recent court appearance, showing off a slimmer figure and grayer hair. This transformation follows his time in the Metropolitan Detention Center as he prepares for a trial on serious charges including racketeering and sex crimes.

  • Judge Arun Subramanian dismissed Diddy's claims about a leak of an assault video due to lack of evidence.
  • Diddy appeared notably thinner and grayer after months behind bars, as described by attendees of the hearing.
  • Attempts by Diddy's legal team to secure bail have been rejected multiple times.
  • The rapper has pleaded not guilty to all charges against him.
“He appeared just astonishingly thinner, which you can expect from him being inside a federal detention center,” said journalist Elizabeth Millner.

This dramatic appearance reflects the pressures Diddy faces as he approaches his trial next May.

item.title: The Raja Saab teaser: Team requests not to believe in rumors - 123telugu
item.description:
The Raja Saab teaser: Team requests not to believe in rumors

Published on: Dec 19, 2024 2:56 am IST

The Raja Saab, directed by Maruthi, is a romantic horror comedy featuring Prabhas in dual roles. The film's team has urged fans not to trust rumors about the teaser's release timing.

  • The film's teaser is rumored to release around Christmas or New Year, but the team has denied this.
  • 80% of the filming is completed, with post-production underway.
  • Theatrical release date is set for April 10, 2025.
  • Malavika Mohanan and Niddhi Agerwal play the female leads in the film.
  • Thaman is the composer for the movie's soundtrack.

#TheRajaSaab shooting is progressing rapidly with continuous day and night schedules. Nearly 80% of the shoot has been completed, and post production work is in full swing. We’ve noticed various speculations circulating about the teaser release during Christmas or New Year.

The team aims to keep fans informed and clear of unnecessary rumors as the film approaches its release date.

item.title: Atlee reacts to Baby John facing tough competition from Pushpa 2 at the box office: 'Allu Arjun spoke to - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Atlee reacts to Baby John facing tough competition from Pushpa 2 at the box office: 'Allu Arjun spoke to Varun Dhawan and...'

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Times of India

Filmmaker Atlee is preparing for the release of Baby John, which is set for December 25. The film will compete with Pushpa 2: The Rule, a blockbuster that has already made over Rs 1400 crore worldwide. Atlee is optimistic about his film's prospects and clarified that there is no direct competition between the two movies.

  • Atlee expresses excitement for Baby John's release amid the successful Pushpa 2.
  • Pushpa 2 has broken box office records, being released on December 5.
  • Atlee maintains that the release dates do not clash, highlighting a friendship with Allu Arjun.
  • Atlee aims to work with every Indian superstar and is passionate about his projects.
“It’s an ecosystem. Me and Allu Arjun sir are very good friends. There’s no conflict here. We’re aware that Pushpa 2 shifted from August to December, and we’ve planned our release around Christmas,” Atlee stated.

This friendly rivalry highlights the collaborative spirit in the Indian film industry as Atlee prepares for Baby John's launch.
